column5: My place is good for couples and solo adventurers. The house is in a quiet waterside community so not suitable for loud, party-types or children or pets please. We will offer our guests a nice, casual comfortable place to relax and enjoy the coast. Bringing a boat? launch area is right across from the house and you can tie-up out front. Beaches are close by. Join us (if you'd like) for dinner Friday night, light breakfast Saturday and full cooked breakfast on Sunday morning.
